T02D3281:27b-1: a'arya rakta ya m'a ri s'a dha nam /
T02D3281:27b-3: 'phags pa gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3281:27b-4: gshin rje'i mgor bzhugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3281:27b-5: dang por re zhig sngags pas bde ba'i stan la nye bar gnas te /
T02D3281:27b-6: sgrub pa pos rang gi snying gar yi ge aam
T02D3281:27b-7: dmar po las nges par grub pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil
T02D3281:27b-8: 'khor rnam par bsgom par bya ba'o //
T02D3281:27b-9: de'i steng du yi ge h'um dmar po rnam par bkod pas gshin rje gshed dmar po dang /
T02D3281:27b-10: bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams mdun du dmigs la /
T02D3281:27b-11: me tog la sogs pas legs par mchod cing phyag
T02D3281:27b-12: kyang 'tshal zhing gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la
T02D3281:27b-13: sogs pa byas la stong pa nyid bsgom par bya
T02D3281:27b-14: ste / aom stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi
T02D3281:27b-15: rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid ni nga yin
T02D3281:27b-16: ste / no bar ro // de'i rjes la yi
T02D3281:27b-17: ge aam dmar po las skyes pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil
T02D3281:27b-18: 'khor gyi steng du yi ge h'um ngo //
T02D3281:28a-0: de yongs su gyur pa las 'dzag pa dang ldan pa'i mgo bos mtshan pa'i @28a * //
T02D3281:28a-1: dbyug to dkar po yi ge h'um gis byin gyis brlabs pa rnam par bsgom par bya ba'o //
T02D3281:28a-2: de dag rnams thams cad yongs su gyur pa las
T02D3281:28a-3: bdag nyid gshin rje gshed du rnam par bsam par
T02D3281:28a-4: bya ste / sku mdog dmar po g-yas bskum pa'i zhabs kyis gnas pa /
T02D3281:28a-5: zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa'o //
T02D3281:28a-6: phyag g-yon pa na khrag gis yongs su gang bar gyur pa'i thod pa ste /
T02D3281:28a-7: phyag g-yas pas ni mgo bos mtshan pa'i dbyug to bsnams pa'o //
T02D3281:28a-8: dbu skra kham ser gyen du 'khyil ba 'dzag par
T02D3281:28a-9: gyur pa'i stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs dang ldan
T02D3281:28a-10: pa // rang ltar snang ba'i shes rab ma rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa /
T02D3281:28a-11: brkyang bskum gyi zhabs kyis gnas pa la 'khyud pa'i bdag nyid du bsgom par bya ba'o //
T02D3281:28a-12: phyi nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs dkar nyi ma'i
T02D3281:28a-13: dkyil 'khor la yi ge h'um gis byin gyis brlabs
T02D3281:28a-14: pa ste / de yongs su gyur pa las 'dzag
T02D3281:28a-15: par gyur pa'i mgo bos mtshan pa'i dbyug to dkar
T02D3281:28a-16: pos mi g-yo bar rnam par bsgoms la /
T02D3281:28a-17: de'i dbus su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dmar po la
T02D3281:28a-18: gnas pa'i yi ge h'um kha dog dmar po rnam
T02D3281:28a-20: de nas gsang bar rdo rje dang yi ge h'um
T02D3281:28a-21: yongs su gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das kyi gsang
T02D3281:28a-22: bar padma 'dab ma brgyad pa la yi ge a'a:
T02D3281:28a-23: dmar po'o // de'i rjes la sngags brjod par bya ste /
T02D3281:28a-24: aom de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad kyi rjes
T02D3281:28a-25: su chags pa'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid
T02D3281:28a-27: de'i rjes la lte ba'i lkog tu cung zad dmar
T02D3281:28a-28: ba'i padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng du yi ge
T02D3281:28a-29: h'um: dmar po 'bar bar gyur par bsam par bya
T02D3281:28a-30: ba'o // shes rab ma ni rgyags pas myos pa
T02D3281:28a-31: 'od 'dzag par dang ldan pa zhal gcig phyag gnyis
T02D3281:28a-32: ma bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mnyam par sbyar
T02D3281:28a-33: ba'i sbyor bas kun nas gnas pa'o //
T02D3281:28a-34: de lta bur gyur pa'i gshin rje gshed dmar po
T02D3281:28a-35: ma hi rsha'i steng na sna tshogs padma la bzhugs
T02D3281:28a-37: de ltar dam tshig la sogs pa rnams cho ga
T02D3281:28a-38: bzhin du 'gro bas thun tshod gnyis sam gsum mam
T02D3281:28b-0: aom a'am dr'im kham h'um ni @28b dam tshig byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags so //
T02D3281:28b-1: aom hr'i: bi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3281:28b-3: aom ya m'a nta ka h'um /
T02D3281:28b-5: 'phags pa gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
